Jobs Description We are looking for top engineers who want to apply what they have learned in their Masters or PhD programs and their hands-on engineering, to tackle challenging problems and, who have the passion and capacity to quickly learn new skills.
Our challenges span cloud, and application development. If you want to dive deeper into Machine Learning, are a strong communicator and collaborator, have solid engineering fundamentals, and are an innovator, we should talk.
Responsibilities  Lead and support the building and maintenance of end:to:end, scalable and flexible data pipelines as the basis for sophisticated analytics and Business Intelligence solutions that allow us to analyse and measure customer journeys and detect anomalies. Enable plug and play data source integration, within technical and organizational context. Apply and further develop concepts and best practices for effective DataOps, driving efficient operationalization of analytics solution and reduce time to market. Thinking creatively to produce new ideas, concepts and developing interactive design;  Requirements:  BS in computer science (with Machine Learning focus) 4+ years experience in software development Strong algorithm development experience Hands-on experience in predictive modeling and analysis  Experience in Supervised and Unsupervised Machine Learning such as Regression, Classification, Anomaly detection, Bagging and Boosting techniques and Time Series Analysis. Experience in Deep Learning methods such as Multilayer Perceptron, RNN, CNN and LSTM.  Skills with Go, Python, R or similar programming language
title: Data Engineer

Jobs Description We’re currently looking for someone who’s eager to lead in transforming the way we handle our DevOps. The ideal candidate will be someone who is a self-starter and is able to bring experience in DevOps and Continuous Delivery systems and best practices. The position also requires deep understanding of Test Driven Development systems to ensure quality code reaches Production.
Responsibilities  Drive, design, implement, and maintain deployment automation from code check-in to production. Support development activities in POC / and Product feature customization/enhancements. Support and maintain all operational activities related to DevOps systems. Champion Test-Driven Development, Acceptance-Test-Driven Development, and Agile best practices, processes, and tools in support of DevOps processes. Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality.  Preferred Qualifications  Excellent communication, presentation and collaborative problem-solving skills. 4+ overall hands-on system software development experience. Self motivated and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. A Bachelor’s/Masters degree in computer science or engineering.
title: DevOps Engineer
